servinfo.title: Seat belt reminder light does not light up

attention3.ptxt: Seat belt reminder can be canceled by scan tool or specified procedure. If neither warning buzzer nor seat belt reminder light operates, first confirm that seat belt reminder is not selected referring to Scan Tool Data . For further details, refer to Seat Belt Construction .

condition.ptxt: Seat belt reminder light does not light up

action.ptxt: Replace fuse and check for short circuit.

ps.ptxt: Data (information) can not be received by CAN communication

action.ptxt: Check BCM for DTC referring to DTC Check .
Check seat belt switch referring to Front Seat Belt Inspection .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
